item.title: Swift and Watson Conversation Service
item.description: Thanks to @jkingoliver, we have a new advanced adventure combining Swift with Watson! This room uses the Watson Conversation Service to create a sandwich shop. Create a Game On! Room in Swift Integrate Watson Conversation Service Go play!
